channel.title: Java not recognized
channel.description:
Hello.
Every time i try to go on my client. A Box appears and i get this error [code]'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
I don't think Environmental variables are wrong..
I'm using java6 update10
Heres my CLASSPATH: [code]CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10;%CLASSPATH%;[/code]
And here's my PATH : [code]PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin[/code]
Can you please tell me what to do, to stop me from getting that error when i load my client up.
Much appriciated.

item.title: Java not recognized
item.dc:creator: @Kalvin Kalvin
item.description:
@Kalvin wrote:

When i do that i get a error which says Note: Some input files use or override a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: server at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:200) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:188) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:252) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(ClassLoader.java:320) Could not find the main class: server. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic

item.description:
@umair wrote:

Edit yhe file you are willing to run and chnage the JDK Version to your one.

item.title: Java not recognized
item.dc:creator: @Kalvin Kalvin
item.description:
@Kalvin wrote:

Hello.

Every time i try to go on my client. A Box appears and i get this error

'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .

I don’t think Environmental variables are wrong…

I’m using java6 update10

Heres my CLASSPATH:

CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10;%CLASSPATH%;

And here’s my PATH :

PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin

Can you please tell me what to do, to stop me from getting that error when i load my client up.

Much appriciated.
